message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-end item. I believe you'll find it valuable, but I'm willing to start with a competitive price. I'm offering the product to you for $12000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm confident the product's value is worth more than your initial offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a fair price. I'm counteroffering at $10500.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I still need to save some money. I'm thinking $9500 is a fair price for the product. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $9500. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to ensure I'm getting a price that reflects the product's value. I'm counteroffering at $11000.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned about the price, but I'm still interested in the product. I'm willing to go up to $10000, but that's my final offer. I need to stay within my budget.

I appreciate your honesty about your budget, and I'm willing to meet you at $10000, but I'm still not sure if that's the best I can get from you. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $10800.

I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, but I'm still interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at $10500, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I need to make a decision soon.
I understand you're getting frustrated, but I'm not willing to give up yet. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $10750.
I'm not willing to go any higher than $10000. I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me at this price. I need to make a decision today.
